description: Bugbane (Actaea simplex (Atropurpurea Group)) is an amazing plant that blooms with unique and beautiful foliage. Its feathery leaves are deep burgundy, almost black, and really stand out. This perennial also has tall and delicate spires of white fragrant flowers that will attract butterflies to any garden. It is a medium-sized deciduous shrub that typically grows to around 5ft in height, making it perfect for use as a backdrop to an outdoor space. Plus, the foliage turns into a charming purple color in the fall, making it an eye-catching feature in any yard. Bugbane truly is a sight to behold.
